fixed_skill.desc: Deal Fire damage to all foes equal to 57.0/59.8/62.7% of Attack. 31.7/33.3/34.9% chance to inflict Burn for 2 turns.
fixed_skill.name: Maragion

innate_skill.desc: Deal Fire damage to 1 foe equal to 114.0/119.7/125.4% of Attack. 63.3/66.5/69.6% chance to inflict Burn for 2 turns.
innate_skill.name: Agilao

passive_skill.desc: Increase critical rate by 7%. Increase Physical damage taken by 10%, and increase Fire damage dealt by 34%.
passive_skill.name: Burning Wheel

passive_skill.desc: Increase critical rate by 7%. Increase Physical damage taken by 10%, and increase Fire damage dealt by 38%.
passive_skill.name: Burning Wheel I

passive_skill.desc: Increase critical rate by 7%. Increase Physical damage taken by 10%, and increase Fire damage dealt by 42%.
passive_skill.name: Burning Wheel II

showtime_skill.desc: Deal Fire damage to all foes equal to 180.0%/192.6%/205.2% of Attack.
showtime_skill.name: Highlight
